newsitem.title: USA: Worldtalk to acquire Deming Software.
newsitem.headline: Worldtalk to acquire Deming Software.

text.p: Worldtalk Corp said Monday it agreed to acquire privately held Deming Software Inc for about 550,000 Worldtalk common shares and $225,000 in cash.

The acquisition will be accounted for as a purchase. Accordingly, Worldtalk expects to record a one-time, principally non-cash charge of about $5.0 million, or $0.50 per share, in the fourth quarter to reflect the write-off of in-process research and development associated with the acquisition.
A developer of electronic mail security software for the Internet, Deming has delivered one of the first commercially available Secure Multi-purpose Internet Mail Extensions tool kits.
